channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New research shows Brexit has cost UK up to £90bn per year in lost tax revenue, Lib Dems say – UK politics live
item.description: A new study by the National Bureau of Economic Research suggests the impact of Brexit has been worse than critics feared at the time Ministers have ba...

item.title: US attorney general vows to appeal dismissal of criminal cases against James Comey and Letitia James – US politics live
item.description: Pam Bondi says she will ‘take all available legal action’ after cases dismissed against ex-FBI director and New York attorney general The US army secr...

item.title: UK bank shares rise after reports of budget tax reprieve
item.description: NatWest, Lloyds and Barclays stock up amid expectation Rachel Reeves will spare lenders from further levy Business live – latest updates UK bank share...

item.title: US to hold Russia-Ukraine peace talks in Abu Dhabi after Kyiv hit with deadly overnight strikes - Europe live
item.description: US army secretary Daniel Driscoll expected to hold meeting today having reportedly already met with Russia on Monday night Nordic correspondent Meanwh...

item.title: Venues cancelled Katie Hopkins shows after man blackmailed them, court told
item.description: Oliver Hutchings accused of threatening to disrupt UK shows and campaign against venues that booked Hopkins A man who objected to comments by Katie Ho...

item.title: Slight improvement in water quality at bathing sites, new figures show
item.description: The annual figures from the Environment Agency show 93% of sites met minimum standards, up from 92% last year.

item.title: Ukraine calls for Trump-Zelensky meeting in US this week
item.description: Meanwhile, the US has confirmed its officials are set to meet Russian representatives in Abu Dhabi

item.title: Graham Linehan cleared of harassing trans activist but guilty of damaging phone
item.description: Comedy writer Graham Linehan "deliberately whacked" a teenage trans woman's phone out of her hand, a court heard.

item.title: UK government urged to step up efforts to return couple jailed in Iran
item.description: Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe's husband told the BBC the UK government should have learned lessons from his wife's detention.

item.title: Heathrow's £49bn plan for longer third runway chosen by government
item.description: Under the selected plan, the runway would be up to 3.5km long and require a new road tunnel under the airport.
